repress.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to stop yourself from doing something you want to do
repress.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Brenda repressed the urge to shout at him.
repress.translation[0].definitions[1].de: if someone represses upsetting feelings, memories etc, they do not allow themselves to express or think about them
repress.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: He had long ago repressed the painful memories of his childhood.
repress.translation[0].definitions[2].de: to control a group of people by force
repress.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: The police were widely criticized for their role in repressing the protest movement.
